name: Card
description: Container component for grouping related content with consistent structure and visual styling

accessibility.screenReader: No specific semantics by default. Content within cards should use appropriate heading levels and landmarks. If card is interactive, ensure proper button/link semantics.

recommendedUsage: Use to group related content like articles, products, or user profiles. Structure with CardHeader, CardContent, and CardFooter for consistent layout across the application.
antiPatterns: Do not nest cards deeply. Avoid using cards for simple containers where no visual grouping is needed. If the entire card is clickable, ensure proper interactive semantics.
